pages.about-us: About FreshFolds - Your Destination for Impeccable Clothes Washing Services HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT FreshFolds LAUNDRY SERVICES FRESHFOLDS - Laundry Care Experts EXPERIENCE LAUNDRY PERFECTION At FreshFolds, we specialize in providing top-quality laundry services. Our dedication extends to every garment, ensuring they receive the care they deserve. From everyday washing to delicate fabric treatments, we guarantee your clothes are impeccably cared for. ABOUT US OUR COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY At FreshFolds, we prioritize environmental responsibility in every aspect of our operations. Here's how we're working towards a greener future: Using eco-friendly detergents and cleaning products Implementing energy-efficient laundry equipment Minimizing water usage through efficient washing processes Offering reusable garment bags and hangers to reduce waste Partnering with local environmental initiatives and charities Learn more about our sustainability efforts here. WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY "FreshFolds made laundry day so much easier for me! Their service is reliable, and my clothes always come back smelling fresh and feeling soft. I highly recommend them!" - Sarah K. "I've been using FreshFolds for months now, and I couldn't be happier. Their attention to detail is impressive, and they handle my delicate fabrics with care. I'm a loyal customer!" - Michael L. "The team at FreshFolds is fantastic! They always go above and beyond to ensure my laundry needs are met. I appreciate their professionalism and friendly service." - Emily S. »SIMPLIFY YOUR LIFE WITH FRESH, CLEAN CLOTHES« SCHEDULE YOUR LAUNDRY SERVICE ONLINE CONVENIENTLY LOCATED FRESHFOLDS LAUNDRY SERVICES 25, Shri Hari Chandlodia Society, Ghansyam Nagar Part 2, Gayatri Nagar, Chandlodiya, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 382481, India Service Hours Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PMSaturday and Sunday: Closed The FreshFolds website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. pages.index: FreshFolds - Immerse Yourself in the Joy of Immaculate Attire and Effortless Laundry Care HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT FreshFolds LAUNDRY SERVICES EFFORTLESS CLEANING SOLUTIONS FOR YOUR WARDROBE Professional Clothes Washing Services Tailored to Your Lifestyle. Experience top-quality laundry care designed to simplify your life. From everyday washing to delicate fabric treatments, we ensure your clothes are fresh, clean, and impeccably cared for. FRESHFOLDS - Laundry Care Experts EXPERIENCE LAUNDRY PERFECTION At FreshFolds, we specialize in providing top-quality laundry services. Our dedication extends to every garment, ensuring they receive the care they deserve. From everyday washing to delicate fabric treatments, we guarantee your clothes are impeccably cared for. ABOUT US OUR COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY At FreshFolds, we prioritize environmental responsibility in every aspect of our operations. Here's how we're working towards a greener future: Using eco-friendly detergents and cleaning products Implementing energy-efficient laundry equipment Minimizing water usage through efficient washing processes Offering reusable garment bags and hangers to reduce waste Partnering with local environmental initiatives and charities Learn more about our sustainability efforts here. WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY "FreshFolds made laundry day so much easier for me! Their service is reliable, and my clothes always come back smelling fresh and feeling soft. I highly recommend them!" - Sarah K. "I've been using FreshFolds for months now, and I couldn't be happier. Their attention to detail is impressive, and they handle my delicate fabrics with care. I'm a loyal customer!" - Michael L. "The team at FreshFolds is fantastic! They always go above and beyond to ensure my laundry needs are met. I appreciate their professionalism and friendly service." - Emily S. OUR PRICING Basic Wash Ideal for everyday clothing $10 per load Includes washing and drying Delicate Care For delicate fabrics and special care $15 per load Includes gentle washing and air drying Express Service Quick turnaround for urgent needs $20 per load Guaranteed same-day service FRESHFOLDS - Laundry Treatments by FreshFolds - Elevating Laundry Care to a New Standard ROUTINE WASHING Maintain freshness with our regular washing services, ensuring your clothes always look and feel their best. DELICATE FABRIC CARE Preserve the integrity of delicate fabrics with our specialized care methods, keeping your favorite garments looking like new. STAIN REMOVAL Bid farewell to stubborn stains with our expert stain removal techniques, restoring your clothes to their pristine condition. STEAM CLEANING Revitalize your garments and eliminate wrinkles with our gentle yet effective steam cleaning process, ensuring a polished appearance. ECO-FRIENDLY CARE Choose environmentally conscious care for your clothes with our eco-friendly cleaning options, contributing to a sustainable future. PROFESSIONAL PRESSING Achieve a polished look with our professional pressing services, ensuring your clothes are impeccably styled and crease-free. »SIMPLIFY YOUR LIFE WITH FRESH, CLEAN CLOTHES« SCHEDULE YOUR LAUNDRY SERVICE ONLINE CONVENIENTLY LOCATED FRESHFOLDS LAUNDRY SERVICES 25, Shri Hari Chandlodia Society, Ghansyam Nagar Part 2, Gayatri Nagar, Chandlodiya, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 382481, India Service Hours Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PMSaturday and Sunday: Closed UPGRADE YOUR LAUNDRY EXPERIENCE FRESHFOLDS - Professional Laundry Care At FreshFolds, we prioritize modern laundry practices combined with eco-friendly detergents and processes. Your clothes' cleanliness and preservation are our top concerns, and we customize our services to fit your specific needs for sustainable and high-quality laundry care. EXCELLENCE IN LAUNDRY CARE QUALITY GUARANTEE Experience excellence in laundry care with our dedication to using premium, eco-friendly products from trusted brands. We collaborate with reputable manufacturers such as Seventh Generation, Ecover, and The Laundress, among others. The fusion of superior products, expert techniques, and our team's proficiency lays the groundwork for your laundry care success. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - FreshFolds: Safeguarding Your Privacy HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT FreshFolds LAUNDRY SERVICES Privacy Policy FreshFolds respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. **Information We Collect:** We may collect various types of information from you, including: Contact information: Name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. Order information: Billing and shipping details, product selections, and purchase history. Usage data: Information about how you interact with our website, such as browsing history and search queries. **How We Use Your Information:** We may use your information for the following purposes: To process your orders and provide you with the services you request. To send you important information about your orders, accounts, and services. To personalize your experience on our website. To improve our website and services. For marketing and promotional purposes, with your consent. **Sharing Your Information:** We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate our website and fulfill your orders. We will only share your information with these providers to the extent necessary to perform these services. We will not sell or rent your information to third parties for marketing purposes without your consent. **Your Choices:** You have choices regarding your information. You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us. You can also access, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us. **Data Security:** We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the security of your information. The FreshFolds website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline SparkleSweep About Us Services Contact Us TEL: +91-2611645422 Legal Notices Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
